name: Mischief On Main Street
description:
Mischief On Main Street is an online multiplayer VR game inspired by the likes of Mafia and Trouble In Terrorist Town.

Lie and bluff your way to victory with 5-12 other players. Discover traitors or stealthily take out innocents to earn points, then see who has the top score after multiple rounds of deceitful competition!

Mischief On Main Street delivers organic fun and laughs like only a social VR experience can, so put your best poker face on and hop in!
